1004.text: Umabako Blu-ray 1 on sale now! \nUmabako 2 goes on sale 5/26!

1005.text: Hey yo! Uma Musume PR manager (reals) \nGold Ship here! Come watch me be a boss♪

1006.text: Uma Musume Season 2 anime is now \navaiable on various streaming services! \nDetails on the official site!

1007.text: Umabako 2 anime, first corner, on sale 5/26! \n(Umabako 1 is currently on sale!)

1009.text: Whaddya think? Ain't it great? \nThis is where I belong, of course!

1010.text: Umabako 2, second corner on sale 6/23! \n(Umabako 1 Blu-ray is still on sale!)

1011.text: Umabako 2, third corner on sale 7/21! \n(Umabako 1 Blu-ray is still on sale!)

1012.text: Umabako 2, fourth corner on sale 8/18! \n(Umabako 1 Blu-ray is still on sale!)

1013.text: WINNING LIVE 02 CD on sale 9/22! Includes \nWINNING LIVE songs and audio dramas.

1015.text: Top Gun Maverick will release on 2022/5/27 \nin USA and Japan simultaneously!

1017.text: Umayon anime Blu-ray BOX on sale 12/8!

1019.text: Uma Musume 1st Anniversary campaign \nstarting in Family Mart!

1020.text: WINNING LIVE 03 CD on sale 2/9! \nContains WINNING LIVE songs and solos.

1021.text: Uma Musume 1st Anniversary \ncampaign live on Pakatube!

1022.text: This way Golshi-chan shows up nice and big. \nThat'll make y'all happy, yeah!?

1023.text: Afternoon party at the Mejiro residence! \nGold phonograph present campaign starting!

1024.text: 3rd EVENT WINNING DREAM STAGE Blu-ray \nfeaturing a full recording of the performance \non sale 6/15!

1025.text: Check the official portal site too!

1026.text: WINNING LIVE 07 CD on sale 9/22! \nContains WINNING LIVE songs and solos. \nIncluding Mejiro Hymn!

1027.text: 1.5th Anniversary goods orders now open! \nFor details, check the official site!

1028.text: WINNING LIVE 08 CD on sale 9/22! \nContains WINNING LIVE songs and solos. \nIncluding Gaze on Me!

1029.text: A short anime about tiny horsegirls! \nUmayuru will be streaming every sunday \nat 21:00 on Pakatube♪

1030.text: Special Uma Musume feature! 16p of content including a symposium with triple crown \nhorsegirls in the 1061th issue of Number!

1031.text: TOKYO MEGA ILLUMINATION collab started!! \nFor details, check the official site!

1032.text: Uma Musume's first "dome live"! \nEnjoy the 4th Event EXTRA STAGE broadcast!

1034.text: Theatric performance \nUma Musume ～Sprinters' Story～ \nCheck the official site for details!

1036.text: 7-11 campaign running from 2/16 to 3/8! \nCheck the official site for details!

1037.text: We are BoC’z！ \nNo hats, no life— \nSpecial site open for a limited time!

1038.text: A new dream is starting to bud...! \nStar Blossom starts serialization!

1039.text: A new Golden Week!? It's Gal Week now! \nWatch the special videos on Pakatube!

1040.text: New anime project ROAD TO THE TOP! \nAiring now on Pakatube!

1041.text: 5th EVENT GO BEYOND -WISH- \nStarting 2023/07/15! \nDetails on the special site!

1042.text: Check the promo site for 5th EVENT details! \nPerformance 1: 7/15-16 \nPerformance 2: 9/16-17

1043.text: Check the promo site for 5th EVENT details! \nPerformance 1: Rerun until 7/23 \nPerformance 2: 9/16-17

1044.text: 5th EVENT 2nd performance -GAZE- \nstarts 09/16-17! Check the site for details!

1047.text: "Don't give up until you get there" \nTV Anime Season 3 airs from 2023/10!

1048.text: 5th EVENT 2nd performance -GAZE- \nre-stream start at 09/23-24! \nCheck the site for details!

1049.text: Real escape game "Escape from this \nunwinnable race" starts!

1050.text: CinGrey Vol. 12 & Star Blossom Vol. 1 \nnow on sale! Details on the website!

1051.text: Special performance of a play by troupe \nFortuna's Ovation: "Tapestry of Endless \nFarewells". We await you at the gymnasium.

1052.text: "Don't give up until you're there!" \nSeason 3 of the TV Anime is airing now! \nCheck the site for details!

1053.text: "Weekly Gallop" magazine's 30th anniversary \nedition available now at major konbinis and \nonline order through Sankei Sports!

1054.text: TOKYO MEGA ILLUMINATION collab started!! \nFor details, check the official site!

1055.text: Golshi became a kindergartener and is \nmaking a fuss?! A new manga begins! \n"PisuPisu☆SupiSupi Golshi-chan"!

1056.text: 3rd performance held at 02/3–4! \n4th performance held at 03/22–23! \nCheck the site for more 5th EVENT details!

1060.text: TV Anime Season 3 "Umabako 3" \nFirst Corner goes on sale 2024/1/31! \nTons of bonuses included!
